Last Placebo Fun Fact: Placebos with unpleasant side-effects work better than those with no side-effects. http://t.co/RFIX92CzeF @MGHAcademy
Placebo Fact 9: A surgical placebo works better than a placebo pill or injection. http://t.co/sJwbASALa0 Learned this at @MGHAcademy

Placebo Fact 7: Homeopathic placebos work just as well as conventional-medication ones. http://t.co/KgceZUKsvk Learned this at @MGHAcademy
Placebo Fact 6: Placebos work best if administered by someone in a white coat. http://t.co/rvhi6p2Bqp … Learned this at @MGHAcademy
Placebo Fact 5: Brand name placebos work better than generic ones. http://t.co/XjzwxYNDf2 … Learned this at @MGHAcademy on Saturday
